entry.title: [PATCH] Change recommended fee to 0.001 BTC
entry.summary: In a discussion among developers on March 11, 2013, the question was raised about whether a new value should be defined solely for display purposes or if MIN_TX_FEE or MIN_RELAY_TX_FEE should be used in some way. Rune Kj√¶r Svendsen suggested that a new value should be created. No further information was provided as to why a new value was deemed necessary.
